prompt: Split the following message from Air Traffic Control into a JSON object into callsign and request like so:

prompt.request: Descend and maintain 4000 feet and reduce speed to 200 knots.

prompt: If the phrase "break" is used, split the message into two or more JSON objects like so:
SkyWest 1234 - Descend and maintain 4000 feet and reduce speed to 200 knots. break JetBlue 1234 - Descend and maintain 4000 feet and reduce speed to 200 knots.

prompt.request: Descend and maintain 4000 feet and reduce speed to 200 knots.
Descend and maintain 4000 feet and reduce speed to 200 knots.

prompt: If "break" is not used, don't split the message into multiple JSON objects.
Available Callsigns: SKW (Skywest), AAL (American), JBU (Jet Blue), DAL (Delta), UAL (United), BAW (Speedbird), SWA (Southwest).
There might be artifacts from speech-to-text, so be mindful of that:
